text: officials in Texas have sought to quash
some of those rumors circulating on
social media and they say they've even
received death threats because of some
of the more outlandish rumors that have
been spread and the FBI has been called
in to investigate the source of some of
those death threats there's about three
days worth of video footage showing
Sandra bland doing everything from being
having her mugshot taken to sleeping in
her cell and they're hoping that the
release of this footage will help to
dispel some of the more outlandish
rumors I mean there was the evidence
that she had an extremely high level of
marijuana in her system when they
carried out tests there was a very high
level of THC which is one of the active
components of marijuana and now there
was the suggestion that maybe Sandra
bland got access to marijuana while she
was in custody but it was just one of
the many unanswered questions the
official autopsy concluded that Sandra
bland committed suicide but there is an
independent autopsy if you like that's
been carried out on behalf of Sandra
Bland's family and the results of which
have yet to be made public
[Music]
